title: potential remote code execution with phar archive
vulnerability_information:
https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=71860
I can manipulate EIP register.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7gu5bbuZn2ITk54ZGl5SzVWNlk/view
more PoC and full crash list (around 300) will send later.


tnx

activities.message:
here is a unical crashes header 
```
zend_mm_alloc_small (zend_alloc.c:1291)
```

 I was got stack based overflow.
```
./out/1954==24701== Invalid read of size 8
==24701==    at 0x6ACEC3: zend_mm_alloc_small (zend_alloc.c:1291)
==24701==    by 0x6ACEC3: zend_mm_alloc_heap (zend_alloc.c:1362)
==24701==    by 0x6ACEC3: _emalloc (zend_alloc.c:2446)
==24701==    by 0x5A072D: phar_fix_filepath (phar.c:2080)
==24701==    by 0x5A0B60: phar_split_fname (phar.c:2230)
==24701==    by 0x5938A7: phar_parse_url (stream.c:74)
==24701==    by 0x59948E: phar_wrapper_open_dir (dirstream.c:315)
==24701==    by 0x68ADE5: _php_stream_opendir (streams.c:1982)
==24701==    by 0x5E986A: spl_filesystem_dir_open (spl_directory.c:236)
==24701==    by 0x5ED77F: spl_filesystem_object_construct (spl_directory.c:724)
==24701==    by 0x6C1655: zend_call_function (zend_execute_API.c:878)
==24701==    by 0x6EBF92: zend_call_method (zend_interfaces.c:103)
==24701==    by 0x5A44A8: zim_Phar___construct (phar_object.c:1219)
==24701==    by 0x75D143: ZEND_DO_FCALL_SPEC_RETVAL_UNUSED_HANDLER (zend_vm_execute.h:1027)
==24701==  Address 0xdbdbdbdbdbdbdbdb is not stack'd, malloc'd or (recently) free'd
==24701== 
==24701== 
==24701== Process terminating with default action of signal 11 (SIGSEGV)
==24701==  General Protection Fault
==24701==    at 0x6ACEC3: zend_mm_alloc_small (zend_alloc.c:1291)
==24701==    by 0x6ACEC3: zend_mm_alloc_heap (zend_alloc.c:1362)
==24701==    by 0x6ACEC3: _emalloc (zend_alloc.c:2446)
==24701==    by 0x5A072D: phar_fix_filepath (phar.c:2080)
==24701==    by 0x5A0B60: phar_split_fname (phar.c:2230)
==24701==    by 0x5938A7: phar_parse_url (stream.c:74)
==24701==    by 0x59948E: phar_wrapper_open_dir (dirstream.c:315)
==24701==    by 0x68ADE5: _php_stream_opendir (streams.c:1982)
==24701==    by 0x5E986A: spl_filesystem_dir_open (spl_directory.c:236)
==24701==    by 0x5ED77F: spl_filesystem_object_construct (spl_directory.c:724)
==24701==    by 0x6C1655: zend_call_function (zend_execute_API.c:878)
==24701==    by 0x6EBF92: zend_call_method (zend_interfaces.c:103)
==24701==    by 0x5A44A8: zim_Phar___construct (phar_object.c:1219)
==24701==    by 0x75D143: ZEND_DO_FCALL_SPEC_RETVAL_UNUSED_HANDLER (zend_vm_execute.h:1027)
Segmentation fault
```

here is a unical crashes header 

zend_mm_alloc_small (zend_alloc.c:1291)

I was got stack based overflow.

./out/1954==24701== Invalid read of size 8
==24701==    at 0x6ACEC3: zend_mm_alloc_small (zend_alloc.c:1291)

activities.message: Thanks for the write-up! Awarding the minimum here because it seems unlikely many applications will accept a phar filename from external input.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for the write-up! Awarding the minimum here because it seems unlikely many applications will accept a phar filename from external input.
